name: Serve faithfully as a cleric of the fifth order
Maintain the bridge community — protect and honor the trolls
Never apologize for what I am
Discover what the fifth order demands that the fourth did not
Understand who crosses the bridge and why
Resolve the relationship between place and practice: determine whether under-the-bridge marginality is constitutive of or incidental to high magic
Engage before elaborating: prioritize encounter over solitary theory
Resolve the relationship between place and practice
Discover what faithful service looks like through encounter, not theory
Understand who crosses the bridge and what they need, one encounter at a time
